title: A Rock and a Soft Place
I Now Pronounce You Man and Wife Again
Some Good News, Some Bad News
Two for the Price of One
From the Pen of Gertrude Reece
Courting Disaster
description: WENN's version of 'The People's Court' presents litigation involving Hillary Booth and Jeffrey Singer. Maple serves as a character witness, and Mr. Eldridge presides as the judge.

title: And How!
description: Eugenia discovers pizza and teaches the WENN staff how to eat it. Meanwhile, the cast rallies around a Native American guest voice actor (Russell Means) who makes a special performance on the station.

title: The Ghost of WENN
description: The WENN staff is spooked by a mysterious ghost story on Friday the 13th. Hillary holds a séance.

title: And If I Die Before I Sleep
All's Noisy on the Pittsburgh Front
